creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: oval to circular bowl; handle has a single band of beads nearer to bowl, last two thirds of handle is adorned by two flowers opening in oppiside directions, end of handle has a group of five beads
markings: [54]/oval [GEORGE JENSEN]/[STERLING]/[DENMARK] and engraved [MGL] at underside near bowl
object_name: Serving Spoon, one of a pair
title: Serving Spoon, one of a pair
